name: Motorola One Fusion+
highlights: 6 GB RAM | 128 GB ROM | Expandable Upto 1 TB

specifications.In The Box: Handset, 18 W Turbo Power Charger, Protective Cover and Film, USB Type C Cable, SIM Tool, Guides

description.HDR10 Certified Full HD+ Display: This Motorola handset packs a 16.51-centimetre (6.5) HDR10 certified Total Vision Full HD+ display with an aspect ratio of 19.5:9, offering you lifelike colours, enhanced brightness, and improved contrast

description.Qualcomm Snapdragon 730G Processor: You can game, watch movies, and multitask between several apps, among other things, without any lag on this phone as it comes equipped with a Qualcomm Snapdragon 730G processor, along with 6 GB of RAM.s

description.5000-mAh Battery: This smartphone’s powerful 5000-mAh battery has what it takes to help you browse the Internet for up to 15 hours, listen to music for about 81 hours, and to do much more for hours on end. It also has a standby time of about 23 days so that the battery life of this device isn’t something that bothers you. Also, when it runs out of battery, you can just charge it for about 15 mins, and you’ll enjoy up to 11 hours of battery - all thanks to its TurboPower charging.

name: POCO X2
highlights: 6 GB RAM | 128 GB ROM | Expandable Upto 1 TB

description.RealityFlow (120 Hz) Display: More the frames, smoother is the viewing experience. This smartphone lets you enjoy just that, with its extreme refresh rate. Not to forget, its FHD+ display with the tall-body design will keep you glued to the visuals on-screen.

description.Quad Rear Camera Array: This smartphone’s quad-camera system (64 MP Sony IMX686 sensor, 8 MP ultra-wide sensor, 2 MP depth sensor, and 2 MP macro sensor) will help you click stunning photos wherever you go.

description.4500-mAh Battery: This smartphone’s powerful 4500-mAh battery has what it takes to help you browse the Internet for up to 15 hours, listen to music for about 81 hours, and to do much more for hours on end. It also has a standby time of about 23 days so that the battery life of this device isn’t something that bothers you. Also, when it runs out of battery, you can just charge it for about 15 mins, and you’ll enjoy up to 11 hours of battery - all thanks to its TurboPower charging.

description.5000-mAh Battery: This smartphone’s powerful 5000-mAh battery has what it takes to help you browse the Internet for up to 15 hours, listen to music for about 81 hours, and to do much more for hours on end. It also has a standby time of about 23 days so that the battery life of this device isn’t something that bothers you. Also, when it runs out of battery, you can just charge it for about 15 mins, and you’ll enjoy up to 11 hours of battery - all thanks to its TurboPower charging.

name: Apple Watch Series 3 42 mm Silver Aluminum White Sport Band
highlights: 3 Activity Rings Tracking - Move, Exercise, Stand

description.The Ultimate Sports Watch: The Skullcandy Sesh boasts the IP55 rating, which makes it resistant to dust, sweat, and water.
description.Intelligent Activity Tracker: Keep tabs on how active you are each day with the watch's three activity rings. Smart Coaching brings you personalised progress updates in the mornings, and suggestions on how to close your rings in the evenings to help you stay motivated. Share your activity log with friends to compete with them, and cheer them on. The Apple Watch celebrates each milestone with you.
